title: Which is better, Poco M2 Pro or Poco X2? - Quora

response.answer_text: Poco X2 is much better than Poco M2 Both the Poco M2 Pro and the Poco X2 run on Android 10. The Poco M2 Pro features a 6.67-inch full-HD+ (1,080x2,400 pixels) display with 20:9 ratio . The Poco X2 has an equivalent size, resolution, ratio, but comes with a 120Hz refresh rate. Both phones, as mentioned earlier, are powered by octa-core processors, but the Poco M2 Pro comes with a Snapdragon 720G while the Poco X2 is powered by the Snapdragon 730G. The newer phone goes up to 6GB of LPDDR4X RAM and therefore the relatively older phone goes up to 8GB of RAM. In terms of cameras, both have quad rear camera setups but in several configurations. The Poco M2 Pro packs a 48-megapixel primary sensor that's amid an 8-megapixel sensor with an ultra-wide-angle lens, a 5-megapixel macro sensor, and a 2-megapixel depth sensor. For selfies, there's a 16-megapixel sensor housed within the hole-punch on the display. In contrast, the Poco X2 features a 64-megapixel primary sensor, an 8-megapixel secondary sensor with an ultra-wide-angle lens, a 2-megapixel macro shooter, and a 2-megapixel depth sensor. There are dual selfie cameras that contain a 20-megapixel primary sensor and a 2-megapixel secondary sensor. The Poco X2 also features a hole-punch design for the selfie cameras. For storage, the Poco M2 Pro goes up to 128GB while the Poco X2 goes up to 256GB, however, both have UFS 2.1 storage. In terms of battery, the Poco M2 Pro comes with a 5,000mAh battery with support for 33W fast charging while the Poco X2 comes with a 4,500mAh battery and support for 27W charging. Talking about the size, the Poco M2 Pro is 165.75x76.68x8.88mm and weighs 209 grams while the Poco X2 comes in at 165.30x76.60x8.79mm and weighs 208 grams.
